mapper.select:
SELECT
reply_code
, b_code
, content
, user_id
, reg_date
FROM
reply
WHERE
b_code = #{bCode}
ORDER BY reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply values( seq_reply.nextval, 1, #{userId}, #{content}, #{bCode}, null, sysdate )
mapper.select: select R.report_code, R.reason_code, R.report_id, R.reply_code, RR.reason_content from report R left join reason_report RR on R.reason_code = RR.reason_code where R.reply_code is not null
